15 February 2010

Baby registry time!

by Aaron Lord

Greetings! I hope this Valentine's/Presidents Day weekend finds you well!

If you’re following my Buzz you probably noticed we registered yesterday at Target. Yes, I know this is our second kid and our first is still in diapers, but we went all-out pink with Ava! We do have white onesies of various sizes, but everything else was pink, so now we are in need of non-girl stuff.

Our son Baxter Isaac is due May 31. I don’t have info on the baby shower yet.
